More importantly, it can also exercise children's thinking and logical ability. In the game clearance success, it also can bring the children full of confidence.

【Portable Handheld Game Design】With Lightweight and never outdated design, this retro games console is great to carry to anywhere and anytime. Not only can you experience the joy of games at home, you can also play games on airplanes, train, or bus, which is an essential entertainment toy for picnic, business and trave,Relax yourself anytime and anywhere.

【Upgrade Rechargeable Battery & Processor】Portable Classic Game Console built-in 1020mAh Rechargeable lithium battery. Never worry about changing battery while electricity runs out. The game can play for up to 5-6 hours each time it is fully charged .No longer to worry about running out of electricity when you're on walking, business trip, traveling, or camping.
